description: An Asian inspired warm salad with cooked vegetables and crispy onions.
name: Traditional Gado Gado Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g tofu, drained and cut into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot of hot water to the boil and cook the potatoes for 12 minutes or until cooked.
Remove the potatoes from the water and set to one side.
Blanche the cabbage in the water for 2 minutes and then remove and set to one side.
Add the eggs to the water and cook for 7 minutes. Then remove from the water and remove the shell.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and fry the tofu for 6 minutes while turning.
Add the beansprouts and peanuts to the pan and fry for a further 4 minutes.
Add the coconut milk, soy, seasoning and sugar to the pan and fry for 5 minutes.
Add the potatoes and cabbage to the pan and cook out for 2 more minutes before serving with boiled egg in each bowl.
